verses.name: Nehemiah 12:10
verses.text: And Jeshua begat Joiakim, Joiakim also begat Eliashib, and Eliashib begat Joiada,

verses.name: Nehemiah 12:11
verses.text: And Joiada begat Jonathan, and Jonathan begat Jaddua.

verses.name: Nehemiah 12:12
verses.text: And in the days of Joiakim were priests, the chief of the fathers: of Seraiah, Meraiah; of Jeremiah, Hananiah;

verses.name: Nehemiah 12:13
verses.text: Of Ezra, Meshullam; of Amariah, Jehohanan;

verses.name: Nehemiah 12:14
verses.text: Of Melicu, Jonathan; of Shebaniah, Joseph;

verses.name: Nehemiah 12:15
verses.text: Of Harim, Adna; of Meraioth, Helkai;

verses.name: Nehemiah 12:16
verses.text: Of Iddo, Zechariah; of Ginnethon, Meshullam;

verses.name: Nehemiah 12:17
verses.text: Of Abijah, Zichri; of Miniamin, of Moadiah, Piltai;

verses.name: Nehemiah 12:18
verses.text: Of Bilgah, Shammua; of Shemaiah, Jehonathan;

verses.name: Nehemiah 12:19
verses.text: And of Joiarib, Mattenai; of Jedaiah, Uzzi;

verses.name: Nehemiah 12:20
verses.text: Of Sallai, Kallai; of Amok, Eber;

verses.name: Nehemiah 12:21
verses.text: Of Hilkiah, Hashabiah; of Jedaiah, Nethaneel.
